attributes.action: Maintain accountability for Police Stop and Search, and avoid a return to the Sus law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Accountability is a key facet in any fair and free democracy, and removing this oversight from this most illiberal of police powers, will only see our once great Democracy fall further from grace. Expanding the stop and search would be equally damaging, as the experience in N. Ireland and the Sus laws prove.
